title: HR Management Practical Competency Enhancement: Mobile-Based Network Engineering Practical Skill Acquisition Course

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can design basic network topologies using the Packet Tracer simulation tool
Learners can explain VLAN configuration and IP address allocation processes through step-by-step practical exercises
In network troubleshooting scenarios, learners can identify root causes of failures with over 80% accuracy using basic diagnostic tools like ping/traceroute
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
